page.title: 16GAMES IN EMSWORTH
page.content: {CHILDREN OVER FIVE}Girls play a more complicated version of Hide and Seek called Om-Pom 1-2-3.In this you have to try and get home before the person who is up sees you;if he sees you he will then run to home which is a pole and says Om-Pom 1-2-3 out.Some girls in the Summer just lie on the school field and talk to each other.Others also lie on the field and watch football. {BOYS}play football and chase.In chase one boy is up and has to chase the other boys.If he catches another boy, the boy he catches is now up.Also they play skipping with the girls if they want to.In this two people hold one end each.They turn it and one person has to jump in and skip until you stop the rope.If you do this then you hold one end.The next person to stop it holds the other end.
